com.atherys.quests.service

Class DialogService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.atherys.quests.service.DialogService

  • public final class DialogService
extends java.lang.Object
    A class responsible for managing all dialogs

      • hasDialog

        public boolean hasDialog(org.spongepowered.api.entity.Entity entity)
        Checks to see if an Entity contains a DialogTree.
        Parameters:
        entity - The entity to be checked
        Returns:
        Whether or not this entity contains a DialogTree

      • getDialog

        public java.util.Optional<DialogTree> getDialog(org.spongepowered.api.entity.Entity entity)
        Used to get the DialogTree an entity is associated with.
        Parameters:
        entity - The entity whose dialog is to be retrieved
        Returns:
        An optional containing the dialog this entity is associated with. The optional is empty if the entity does not contain a dialog.

      • setDialog

        public boolean setDialog(org.spongepowered.api.entity.Entity entity,
                         DialogTree tree)
        Associate an entity with a DialogTree. When a player attempts to interact with this entity, they will begin the dialog.
        Parameters:
        entity - The entity to be assigned a dialog
        tree - The dialog tree itself
        Returns:
        Whether or not setting the dialog was successful.

      • removeDialog

        public boolean removeDialog(org.spongepowered.api.entity.Entity entity)
        Removes any DialogTree from an entity.
        Parameters:
        entity - The entity to have its dialog removed
        Returns:
        Whether the removal was successful

      • hasPlayerDialog

        public boolean hasPlayerDialog(org.spongepowered.api.entity.living.player.Player player)
        Used to check if a player is currently in a dialog with an NPC or not.
        Parameters:
        player - The player to check
        Returns:
        Whether or not the player is participating in a dialog

      • getPlayerDialog

        public java.util.Optional<Dialog> getPlayerDialog(org.spongepowered.api.entity.living.player.Player player)
        Used to get the dialog the player is currently participating in.
        Parameters:
        player - The player whose dialog is to be gotten
        Returns:
        An optional containing the dialog. Is empty if no dialog is found.

      • removePlayerDialog

        public void removePlayerDialog(org.spongepowered.api.entity.living.player.Player player)

      • startDialog

        public java.util.Optional<Dialog> startDialog(org.spongepowered.api.entity.living.player.Player player,
                                              org.spongepowered.api.entity.Entity entity)
        Begin a dialog between a player and an entity. This will check if the player is currently in another dialog. If so, the dialog will not be started. This will also check if the entity has a dialog. If not, a dialog will not be started.
        Parameters:
        player - The player participant
        entity - The entity participant
        Returns:
        An optional containing the dialog. Empty if failure.
